oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Mayor Beverly Briley speaking at his inauguration, April 1, 1963
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of Mayor Beverly Briley speaking at his inauguration on April 1, 1963. Briley served as the first mayor of the Metropolitan Government of Nashville and Davidson County. His inauguration took place on the same day that the consolidation of the city and county governments took effect. b & w; 35 mm.
